original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘padumassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena padumassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, padumaṁ udake jātaṁ udake saṁvaddhaṁ anupalittaṁ udakena;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja padumam udake jātam udake sa vaddham an upalittam udakena

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kule gaṇe lābhe yase sakkāre sammānanāya paribhogapaccayesu ca sabbattha anupalittena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena kule gaṇe lābhe yase sakkāre sammānanāya paribhoga paccayesu ca sabbattha an upalittena bhavitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, padumassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja padumassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, padumaṁ udakā accuggamma ṭhāti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja padumam udakā accuggamma ṭhāti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbalokaṁ abhibhavitvā accuggamma lokuttaradhamme ṭhātabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sabba lokam abhibhavitvā accuggamma lokuttara dhamme ṭhātabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, padumassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja padumassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, padumaṁ appamattakenapi anilena eritaṁ calati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja padumam appamattakena api anilena eritam calati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena appamattakesupi kilesesu saṁyamo karaṇīyo, bhayadassāvinā viharitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena appamattakesu pi kilesesu sayamaḥ karaṇīyaḥ bhaya dassāvinā viharitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, padumassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja padumassa tatiyam aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena ‘aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū’”ti.
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu uti
